sentences.en: Compared with market externality, regulation externality may affect allocation, stabilization, distribution and growth efficiency o.
sentences.cn: 与市场外部性比较, 规制外部性可能影响配置 、 稳定 、 分配和增长.

sentences.en: However, the negative externality of the over urbanization can counteract the effect of the investment.
sentences.cn: 而且过度城市化的负面效应会抵消投资所带来的效应.

sentences.en: In the technology transfer of Multi - National Company ( MNC ) , there's externality, which means technology spillover effect.
sentences.cn: 跨国公司 在技术转移中存在着外部性―溢出效应.

sentences.en: In the view of internal conditions, it puts an emphasis on externality and embeddedness.
sentences.cn: 从集群内部条件出发, 论文重点分析了临港产业集聚中的外部性与根植性.

sentences.en: Keywords: ahazard potency of debris flow, externality, cost - benefit analysis.
sentences.cn: 关键词: 土石流特定水土保持区 、 外部性 、 成本效益 分析.

sentences.en: Please explain the definition of network externality and its classification.
sentences.cn: 试解释网络外部性的概念及其分类.

sentences.en: Pollution is considered as a form of negative externality in economic growth.
sentences.cn: 摘要环境污染是经济增长过程中的“负产品”.

sentences.en: Reverse logistics has positive externality on account of its feature of quasi - public goods.
sentences.cn: 逆向物流具有准公共物品的特征,由此决定了它还具有正外部效应和负外部效应.

sentences.en: The damage caused by second - hand smoke in pubs is not an externality.
sentences.cn: 在酒吧中,二手烟造成的伤害不属于外部性.

sentences.en: The problem of environmental pollution roots in the characteristic of public goods and negative externality.
sentences.cn: 环境污染问题根源于公共物品性和负外部性.

sentences.en: The root of above mentions issues lies in the externality of environmental cost.
sentences.cn: 环境成本外部化是这些问题的根源.

sentences.en: There is no negative externality there: they've knowingly taken the risk.
sentences.cn: 这就不存在负外部性的问题,因为他们对风险是知情的.

sentences.en: With every news report , the externality dimension of environmental problems seems to become clearer.
sentences.cn: 新闻曝光使污染问题的外延型更加清晰.

words.tran_cn: 外部的；表面的；[药] 外用的；外国的；外面的
走读生；走读医学研究生
给…以外形；使具体化，使客观化

trans.tran_cn: 外在性，外形，外部事物，（经济学名词）外部效应
trans.tran_en: the state or condition of being external
